title: material
description: The material appearance of a primitive.

pbrMetallicRoughness.description: A set of parameter values that are used to define the metallic-roughness material model from Physically-Based Rendering (PBR) methodology.

normalTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A tangent space normal map. Each texel represents the XYZ components of a normal vector in tangent space. <TODO: Add more explaination on how XYZ is calculated>.

occlusionTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The occlusion map is a greyscale texture, with white indicating areas that should receive full indirect lighting and black indicating no indirect lighting. <Todo: sRGB ? Color Space>.

emissiveTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The emissive map controls the color and intensity of the light being emitted by the material. This texture contains RGB components in sRGB color space. If a fourth component (A) is present, it is ignored.

emissiveFactor.description: The emissive color of the material.
emissiveFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The RGB components of the emissive color of the material. If an emissiveTexture is specified, this value is multiplied with the texel values.
